name: Escape (itch) (wolg)
description:
FallBall is similar to puzzles where in order to pass another level you will have to overcome a real challenge! The main mechanic of game is a controlling the ball by creating a trajectory in order to give the ball phisical force which will depend from your swap. For every 10 levels you will recieve bonus, but walkthrough will not be easy! Right now game has 50 levels, but future updates will bring skins for every 10 levels!

In order to pass level you will need to, without dying, press all buttons and pull all levers. You can do this by jump which will be created by swipe of your screen with your controller.
